title: Business, abcademe back blockchain initiative to monitor govt projects
description: MANILA, Philippines — Following an initial briefing, over 40 multisectorial leaders have been invited to endorse the 'Integrity Chain,' a new initiative that will use blockchain and artificial intelligence to promote transparency in public governance.

title: UAE President Sheikh Mohamed meets OpenAI CEO Sam Altman; awarded honorary doctorate for AI leadership
description: Middle East News: UAE President Sheikh Mohamed bin Zayed Al Nahyan meets with OpenAI CEO Sam Altman to discuss AI research and innovation partnerships, highlighting the UAE's commitment to becoming a global AI leader. Sam Altman awarded honorary doctorate for AI leadership by Mohamed bin Zayed University of Artificial Intelligence (MBZUAI)
content: UAE President Sheikh Mohamed bin Zayed met OpenAI CEO Sam Altman in Abu Dhabi to explore deeper AI collaboration. The visit aligns with the UAE’s strategic push in AI research, infrastructure, and language innovation. Altman was awarded an honorary d... [3911 chars]

title: AI users more inclined to dishonesty, study finds
description: People who rely on artificial intelligence (AI) at work or school are more likely than others to "cheat," according to a team of French and German researchers.
content:
BERLIN: People who rely on artificial intelligence (AI) at work or school are more likely than others to "cheat," according to a team of French and German researchers.

title: Is artificial intelligence quietly reshaping campus placements?
description: Recruiters have rebalanced offers and campuses have retooled curricula to prioritise digital fluency. Graduates with AI and data skills have secured a clear premium while others have been urged to catch up.
content:
For campus recruiters and students alike, 2025 has felt like a new playbook. Employers have recalibrated priorities around artificial intelligence and data fluency, reshaping who earns more and which graduates get first pick.

title: Chatbots cannot stop making up fake facts, OpenAI researchers admit
description: One of the problems with using artificial intelligence (AI) chatbots is the seemingly insouciant manner in which they "hallucinate" – industry jargon for them making stuff up instead of conceding they aren't sure about what they are writing.

title: China wants its companies to use local AI chips. Tech firms signal that they hear the call
description: SHENZHEN: Chinese tech companies have been showcasing support for home-grown artificial intelligence (AI) chips, as Beijing presses firms to curb their reliance on US chipmaker Nvidia and use local processors in a push for self-sufficiency.

title: ‘In December, a visit from Mr Putin is being planned to New Delhi’: Russian FM Lavrov at UNGA
description: "We have a very extensive bilateral agenda, trade, military, technical cooperation, finance, humanitarian matters, healthcare, high-tech, artificial intelligence, and of course close coordination at the international level within the SCO, BRICS and bilaterally..." He said that India is "perfectly capable" of making their own decisions in its trade relations with Russia.

title: IIT Council meet today: Credit transfer among IITs, scholarships, making JEE (A) less coaching-dependent on agenda
description: The council will also discuss necessary changes in curriculum, pedagogy, and assessments in response to the advent of Artificial Intelligence.
content:
The agenda of the meeting also includes discussions on accreditation of IITs and enhancing scholarships and pocket allowances for SC and ST students.
The council last held its meeting in April 2023.

title: #WND2025: You deserve the truth, not AI’s interpretation of it
description: Now, more than ever, we must constantly question what's real and what's the creation of artificial intelligence.
